subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The call-ups for a national team training camp in January in Los Angeles included some notable names from Major League Soccer, such as Mike Magee, the league’s most valuable player.
snippet: The call-ups for a national team training camp in January in Los Angeles included some notable names from Major League Soccer, such as Mike Magee, the league’s most valuable player.
